duties_responsibilities.duty: Accountable for the success of relationships with Salesforce and other partnerships, measured through new business opportunities, solution adoption, support of the sales team, and joint GTM activities.
Engage directly with strategic customers, partners, and internal stakeholders as a primary point of contact on partnerships.
Coordinate launches of integrations or joint solutions with Salesforce and other partners.
Coordinate joint presence at key events and industry events.
Develop innovative integrations or business models aligning with company objectives.
Collaborate with Marketing and Sales teams to build joint go-to-market plans, marketing engines, and sales strategy materials.
Develop joint sales plays that effectively position partners in conjunction with the core benefits of the company.
Drive sales enablement efforts around joint solutions across the global sales organization; be the partner evangelist within the sales organization.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 7 years of relevant sales, business development, or alliances experience (MBA or advanced degree preferred).
